content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.]
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Magdeburg.]
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[Yes, we agreed on a final price of 700 euros per month.]
name: Max Müller

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[The final price agreed upon was 700 euros per month.]
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 10.]
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
[There was no such instance where I felt discriminated or offended.]
name: Max Müller
